05069.mean:
the seventeenth consonant of the Sirijunga alphabet.

सिरिजङ्गा वर्णमालाको सत्रौं व्यञ्जनवर्ण ।

05073.mean:
1. to fall down; to have a fall; to drop/tumble. 2. (of prices) to decrease; to be less; to come down; to fall. 3. to be degraded/demoted.

१. (माथिबाट) खस्नु; झर्नु । २. (भाउ आदि) कमी हुनु । ३. स्तर वा पद तल झर्नु ।

05074.mean:
1. (water etc) to heat/make hot. 2. to boil (milk, tea etc).

१. तताउनु; तातो पार्नु । २. (दुध, चिया आदि) उमाल्नु; उमाल्ने प्रकृयाले पकाउनु ।

05080.mean:
1. human being. 2. person; individual. 3. person.

१. मानिस । २. व्यक्ति । ३. (भाषा) पुरूष ।

05085.mean:
very much; many; considerable; nearly; almost.

निकै; झन्नै ।

05086.mean:
mother; an address to the mother in thire person.

आमा; आमालाई सङ्केत गरेर ‘आमा’ भनी तृतीय पुरुषका रूपमा भनिने शब्द ।

05088.mean:
in a fondling/caressing way.

छामछाम छुमछुम गरी छाम्ने तरीकाले ।

05094.mean:
a kind of grass that grows among and looks like paddy plants.

सामा (झार); धानखेतमा उम्रने धानको बोट जस्तै देखिने एक प्रकारको घाँस ।

05095.mean:
a kind of herb with a tuberous root used as an antidote to poison. Acnitum bisma.

बिखुमा (जडीबुटी); बिखे झार ।

05096.mean:
[Tamor] slowly; gently; doing late.

[तमर] बिस्तार; बिस्तारै; ढिलो, अबेर गर्ने चालाले ।

05098.mean:
1. smile; smilingly; in a smiling manner; with a smile or smiles. 2. a kind of lentil (pulse).

१. मुसुक्क; मुसुक्क हाँस्ने किसिमले । २. मस्याङ् दाल ।

05100.mean:
1. to be intoxicated/drunk/stoned/besotted. 2. to dig (with hoe, mattock, spade etc). 3. to till the soil; to work at soil/till/farm (with spade etc).4. helping verb which when suffixed to a noun denotes ‘greet’ ‘formally’, etc. 5. to make sb intoxicated with wine or infatuated/insolent with pride.

१. मात्नु; मात लाग्नु । २. (कुटो, कोदालो आदिले) खन्नु । ३. बारी खन्नु (खेती गर्नु) । ४. ना शब्दको पछाडि आएर ‘प्रणाम गर्नु, ढोग गर्नु’ आदि बुझाउने सहायक क्रिया । ५. लागु पदार्थ द्वारा लाग्ने बनाउनु; रक्सी वा गर्वले मताउनु ।

05104.mean:
1. to be intoxicated/drunk/stoned. 2. to drink till intoxicated/drunk/stoned/besotted; to be insolent/infatuated with pride.

१. मादक पदार्थले लाग्नु; मात्नु । २. मात्तिउन्जेल पिउनु; गर्वले मात्तिनु/चूर हुनु ।

05105.mean:
1. mother. 2. mother-in-law; an address/term used by the son or daughter-n-law for his/her mother-in-law.

१. आमा; जननी । २. सासू; ज्वाइँ। वा बुहारीले सासूफाई सम्बोधन गर्दा प्रयुक्त हुने शब्द ।
